website_summaries.verdict: This option delivers a good audio experience in a basic, inexpensive set of headphones. Those with larger heads may wish to consider another option, however.
pros: Features Supreme Sound and rotating earcups
Folds, and the wire is detachable, for travel or storage
Inline mic and controls let you answer calls or control music
Has soft ear cushions for comfort
cons: Some felt these were too small, or didn't stay firmly on your head if you were using them during a workout, etc
Headband can be a little uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: These things are great basic headphones
customer_reviews.text: These things are great basic headphones. -they fold up -the wire is detachable, thus ending the major cause of breaking headphones -they have a mic/pause button -in black, they look plain enough .. not like I'm trying to impress everyone in home room! Too bad SkullCandy doesn't make them any more
customer_reviews.author: Nick Parlante

customer_reviews.title: The sound was great and the extra padding was a nice touch
customer_reviews.text: The sound was great and the extra padding was a nice touch. I was pleasantly surprised when after over a month of use I realized that with a bit of pulling they could be extended to fit better for people with larger heads like me. That made them ten times better.
customer_reviews.author: Anna B.

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping, product arrived fully package and was brand new.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones because they are my favorite style of Skullcandy headphones, and Skullcandy has currently discontinued them unfortunately. My only complaint about the product itself is that I wish that the headphones fit a bit more tightly, so that I could enjoy the sound quality better. I can't speak on behalf of these headphones yet, but in the past the Skullcandy Lowriders usually last me for about 6 months, which isn't bad in my opinion considering the price, you get what you pay for. We'll see how these ones do. Buy them now before there's none left! Or don't, so that there's more for me. :)
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: These squeeze my head too much for comfort, so I can't wear them very long
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these headphones for years and I love them, but this pair has been troublesome for me. Normally they fit perfectly on my small-ish head. Most headphones are too big for me even on the smallest setting, but these tend to fit me best. However, this most recent pair has been a bit too small. They squeeze my head too much for comfort making these not good for long use. It's a shame, because other than that I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, comfortable, crisp, clear, loud... but thats not a good thing, because the envelope is awful, being mid rich with clipped highs and poor bass response. Such a shame because they're pretty nice for the money, in build. Compared with comparably priced Sony, they're way more comfortable, but not even in the ballpark, in sound quality. Thumbs DOWN. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Snickers10

customer_reviews.title: Good for wheelchair users
customer_reviews.text: I’m an frequent buyer for this skull headphones as it works well with me and good value for the money. Been in my wheelchair, sometimes my previous headphone cord gets caught up taggled on my wheels. But this headphones has ditachment pins on them, so if it snaps, the cord snaps out and I can always reconnect them again . I just got another today, had some issues with the sound, thought it was the cord, replaced my new headphones with my old one laying around, connected them, and it worked good. This is better than wireless headphones
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Too small for adults
customer_reviews.text: When I seen them in the box I knew they would be too small for me.
customer_reviews.author: obironkenobi

customer_reviews.title: At first I loved these, but I guess my head is too ...
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved these, but I guess my head is too small because they keep sliding back when I go to the gym. They fit and stay put when I'm not moving around. Guess these are my traveling headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Luck 13

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money.  Comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves Skullcandy Lowrider headphones. He finds them comfortable to wear for long periods of time. He has had 3 pairs now. They're not super-durable and the sound isn't as good as higher-end headphones, but they're what you'd expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: CABookFan

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my to brother. He says there ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my to brother. He says the cable seems to be broken. Also the price tags from Ross were not completely taken off.
customer_reviews.author: ADESOYE SAMUEL

customer_reviews.title: Item is as described
customer_reviews.text: Durable, good sound quality and lightweight. The best in this price range. In fact I’ve bought more expensive headphones that weren’t this good.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cooks

customer_reviews.title: VERY PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my son, he is not the most careful and they have held up for almost 2 years now ... very happy with the value and the quality of these headphones
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A steal! Great headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are a steal for the price. I only use them at work and they are unexpectedly noise cancelling for me as well - I don't hear people around me to my own detriment at times. The sound quality is excellent for such an affordable pair of headphones. Very surprising!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Headphones & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice Headphones & Comfortable....Good Sound..Its A Steal..Skullcandy Earbuds...I Can Hear The Bass Much Better...But These Got Nice Bass Too...I Poke Holes in Skullcandy Symbols Eye's...Bass Sounds Better Now....
customer_reviews.author: Joshua L. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I had another set like the, and wanted a set for my school videos on my laptop. I bought the black.
customer_reviews.author: christina schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Decent bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Bought specifically to match my Bordeaux Retro 12 Jordans. The color is perfect. Sound is a decent bag for your buck. The cable detaches and is of very high quality. They look and sound great for your money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Charles

customer_reviews.title: Already Broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for Christmas. They sounded great, looked good, and were comfortable. Unfortunately, after only three months, one side has no sound and the other side crackles. I saw there is a 2-year warranty, so I sent them in for repair or replacement. Fingers crossed...
customer_reviews.author: Holliejf

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones.
customer_reviews.text: This headphone is fantastic. The bass is really good and for gaming is one of the best assets I can have. Music is really good, this headphone makes you hear every little detail of the music.
customer_reviews.author: luis sanchez

customer_reviews.title: DIDNT WORK! DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't even work and was a complete waste of money. Luckily I got a return I was very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: MONA A.

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones but tend to slip off your head
customer_reviews.text: The headphones came quickly and work well, with good sound quality. However, they don't stay on your head very well, which is an issue I'm experiencing more the more I use them. Whenever I look down I have to literally hold them or they will fall off. Otherwise, I really love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Metheny

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved them the sound quality is great. I always buy Skullcandy.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sound
customer_reviews.text: My teen absolutely loves the skull candy headphones. They have a very nice quality of sound and fold nicely.
customer_reviews.author: r

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing as long as these are available I will keep on buying my last pair died because I dropped them repeatedly
customer_reviews.author: racquel

customer_reviews.title: Fairly good! Easily portable
customer_reviews.text: Fairly good! Easily portable, and the audio quality for both the headphones and the mic are good. Unfortunately the cable only lasted about five months before it started to fritz out.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have great sound with really good bass. They are very comfortable and the detachable cord is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: John McCartney

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves these headphones. Good sound and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: hallieallie

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my daughter and she likes it
customer_reviews.author: grissel luna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing people think they're beats but way better because cheaper and great quality
customer_reviews.author: Ro He

customer_reviews.title: Pure junk, lasted a month.
customer_reviews.text: This broke a day after the amazon return window expired. It was lightly used, treated well. Pure junk.
customer_reviews.author: gazoline19

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and Portable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the comfort, portability, and sound quality. This is my second one. I bought one for my sister before deciding to buy one for my self.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great so far ,,my 9 and 13 year old love it
customer_reviews.author: hanz

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: These were a replacement for former Skullcandy headphones that broke. Comfortable to wear and have a decent sound quality for this price point. My son loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Jnoe

customer_reviews.title: Great for HQ Bass.
customer_reviews.text: I've always enjoyed Skullcandy headphones. Great quality for an understandable price. Also, really lightweight, and pretty durable for its size. Just don't go *trying* to break them, they aren't that durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jaron Tillery

customer_reviews.title: Dont miss out!
customer_reviews.text: For the price you get much more. Their light, don't slip off, and loud. Whether it's music or a phone call.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tafolla

customer_reviews.title: Just got these today
customer_reviews.text: Delivered a day earlier than estimated. So far they sound really good and are comfortable. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Like that they fold up. Good for travel.
customer_reviews.author: JRK

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the best quality of sound and sound-isolation but for its price, it's pretty good I must say.
customer_reviews.author: Irakli

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a good pair for my son's birthday and wanted Skullcandys for ...
customer_reviews.text: I did extensive research on headphones. I wanted a good pair for my son's birthday and wanted Skullcandys for sure. So I ordered these and actually went to try and cancel it later. I thought, I would get what I paid for... which wasn't much. It was too late to cancel but I'm happy for the outcome. They're incredibly comfortable. The sound is clear too. We haven't tried the microphone part yet. He loves them. So as long as they continue to satisfy him, I'm good!
customer_reviews.author: Jackabee

customer_reviews.title: Very light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love em upgraded version of pair I bought years ago
customer_reviews.author: Nikki's Account

customer_reviews.title: Love These
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two pairs of theses headphones for my boyfriend and I to use on an upcoming trip and we love them! They are comfortable and sound great for the price. They keep out noise around you and play effortlessly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cord is detachable and connects on just one side.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these headphones constantly. The sound quality is great, especially for this price. This brand will be the only one I will buy in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Like the sound.durible enough except the cord.(have bought a new one.works great.)
customer_reviews.author: St. Hubbins

customer_reviews.title: I'll never stop buying the lower riders
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the low riders. This is my second pair. My first pair lasted me 4 years, and I'm like a bull in a China shop, constantly dropping them to say the least. They're a great price for the comfort, longevity and bass.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable headphones with good quality sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable headphones with good quality sound for the price. Very lightweight and they fold up nicely. Also very sturdy - I throw them in my bag to go to and from work and its no problem! Just wish it had more controls on the microphone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great storage quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality & light weight for all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Cabrera Berumen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and fit but this is my second set and once again one side is dead.
customer_reviews.author: John Mytinger

customer_reviews.title: Low cost doesn't mean low quality
customer_reviews.text: At an affordable cost without sacrificing sound quality, these convenient headphones are hard to beat
customer_reviews.author: Roy Escobar

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: I came on time. Its loud but the ear cups needs to be bigger. And the headphone band needs to be a bite bigger as well. Other than that great pair of headphones
customer_reviews.author: Richard P.

customer_reviews.title: These are great headphones. Good sound
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones. Good sound, fit comfortably on my head. I do wish they were adjustable, but again since they fit my head I can't really complain!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is really good. If you want to have a headphone with less money and quality sound, then go for it
customer_reviews.author: Zunied

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I love to use it while studying ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I love to use it while studying in a noisy area, as it muffles well the noise. Recomment it.
customer_reviews.author: Client 1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. Blocks out a lot of sound
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Trantham

customer_reviews.title: Improved Over Older Models
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of these over the older model Skullcandy headphones. The cord that goes from the earphones to the computer / Ipod, etc would go bad about every two years. With these the cord is removable, which keeps it from tangling in storage and also allows for replacement of just that cord instead of the entire set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely in love with these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with these headphones. The maroon has a great matte finish that doesn't show marks or scuffs. The band isn't bulky although padded and fits either over head (as intended) or well behind head. I usually never wear headphones as they tend to give me a headache and/or hurt my ears after ten minutes but these are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Family

customer_reviews.title: A Great Pair!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace an old pair of my daughter's. She had a pair by the same company for four years & the wear on them started to become obvious, but the sound is still great on those. The sound of these are wonderful (she has no complaints). Its nice that these fold to make traveling with them easier (her old pair didn't do this). The headband cushion makes these very comfortable. The coloring on these is very nice. They are a great pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.

customer_reviews.title: Bring Back the 2011 Model
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones after my previous pair finally bit the dust. I had bought the earlier model of Lowriders back in 2011, and they have lasted this long despite an insane amount of use. I was disappointed as soon as I opened the package. The new model looks and feels cheap, nothing like the older version. I immediately purchased a pair of 2011 Lowriders, which have been discontinued by the manufacturer, and will be returning these ones. Not even worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Some advantages vs. Hesh 2
customer_reviews.text: Like these very much and alternate using them with the Hesh 2 wireless. These have the lightweight and foldable advantage. If these were wireless or if the Hesh folded up we'd have perfection, but these days we "need" wireless.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Rubinstein

customer_reviews.title: Cool Headphones For A 10 Year old at school
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for my 10 year old son at school with his IPad! The fluorescent yellow with light and dark grey look cool and the sound from these is not bad either. Pretty good price too. Why should I pay hundreds of dollars for headphones? Some the prices are just crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Shane McCully

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, bad design.
customer_reviews.text: Let me say, the sound is awesome, Skullcandy knows how to make great sounding headphones. But, I bought these to workout with. Unfortunately, they do not stay on my head and I spent much of the time adjusting them and trying to keep them on. If you are looking for headphones to just sit and listen to music, these are for you.
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: They do not adjust around your head so depending on ...
customer_reviews.text: They do not adjust around your head so depending on how large your head is and your hairstyle, these may not fit
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One great item and with excellent Customer Service and good Delivery Service. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Edgardo Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones that fold up nicely.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones produce great sound. We love that they are easily portable because they fold up into a small hand-sized package.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I've always had good luck with this brand of headphones and this one was no exception. Very clear and full sound.
customer_reviews.author: Roy  Chris

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a Christmas gift. The right side produces no sound at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Great value, planning to get another pair
customer_reviews.text: They're very well made and the sound is crisp and full. Great value, planning to get another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Van Gopher

customer_reviews.title: These are ok, but they hurt my head after ...
customer_reviews.text: These are ok, but they hurt my head after using them for any length of time greater than 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: T. M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good for Kids
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year old loves these and is on his second pair. I only wish they weren't discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer HTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My 9 year old loves these and they have great sound!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great and the color is exactly how it looks. Very comfy!
customer_reviews.author: DbDoily

customer_reviews.title: Didnt like
customer_reviews.text: Worst design...hurts head on top....not fixed to head properly..falls often...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I've bought skullcandy products for many year for presents. ...
customer_reviews.text: I've bought skullcandy products for many year for presents. Finally broke down and bought some for my daughter this year. She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need for mp3s , games and movies on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound great.
customer_reviews.text: So these took forever to get here, they were delayed twice but they did arrive in time for Christmas, and they sound great. Not the biggest fan that the cord is exposed where the headphones bend at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: flexible material that is not easily chewed through
customer_reviews.text: My 11-year-old loves chewing the rubber cords on his headphones and he has destroyed many sets...So I gave up... But these are actually covered with strong, flexible material that is not easily chewed through, and so far they have lasted longer than any set he has had. I find Skullcandy headphones to be of high quality and I have now bought a pair for my daughter. They fold and the cord only plugs into one side, and if the cord gets chewed away again, I just replace the cord! So, just in case, I bought a cheap pack of multiple cords in fun colors! :)
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item/color
customer_reviews.text: Purple not black, and not even the same model. Looks like the girlfriend just scored new headphones.
customer_reviews.author: James Bishop

customer_reviews.title: lowrider
customer_reviews.text: on ear?why? what a dumb concept. every headphone should be cupped, period. sound?..yeah, theyre headphones. theyd be better if, they were cupped...duh.. hey, skullcandy, if, if, you somehow read this, imagine me shaking my head in dissapointment..shame on you...I'm honestly waiting for one of the speakers to stopping working..it happens a lot.. ill just stick to the buds. I tried, you didnt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Skullcandy Lowrider Headphones with Rotating Earcups, Supreme Sound Tuning, All Day Comfort, and Built-In Mic; Perfect for Active Lifestyles and Easy Listening, Maroon/Brown/Copper
product_meta.description: Size:One Size| Color:BrownThe Skullcandy Lowrider Headphones w/Mic absolutely bump with their high-quality 40mm drivers, making them a great choice for low-budget music aficionados. Compatible with the iPhone and most smartphones, the inline microphone control allows you to answer calls and control your music with the play/pause button. Super-soft ear cushions make for a comfortable listening experience, and the dj-style articulation works great for mixing music or simply tuning into the outside world for a split-second. In addition, these ultra-portable headphones conveniently fold for easy traveling and storage.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars384 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
